sourcesContent:
Bonjour {{connectedUser.firstname}}

  • Accueil
  • Mes Events
  • Mes Réservations
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { IAuthUser } from '../models/IAuthResult'; import { AuthService } from '../shared/services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.scss'] }) export class NavbarComponent { connectedUser :IAuthUser | undefined; constructor(private _authService : AuthService){} ngOnInit() : void { this._authService.$connectedUser.subscribe({ next : (user : IAuthUser | undefined) => { this.connectedUser = user; }, error : () => {}, complete : () => {} }) } disconnect() : void { this._authService.logout(); } }
